getChildRelationship

IterableFieldAdaptor getChildRelationship(java.lang.String relationShipName)
Returns a child table of data related to the parent object.

Parameters:
relationShipName - The name of the related rowset of data.
Returns:
a child rowset with the specified name or NULL if there is no child relationship with the specified name.

addChildRelationship

IterableFieldAdaptor addChildRelationship(java.lang.String string)
                                          throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
Adds a new child relationship to the parent object

Parameters:
relationShipName - The name of the related rowset of data.
Returns:
the newly created childRelationship
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If adding child relationships is not supported by this adapter
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the specified relationship already exists
